content: diamond and lozenge baby blanket very simple fully reversible baby blanket using sport weight yarn gauge approx 21 sts x 34 row in pattern stitch blocked but gauge is not critical for 30 square blanket uses 800 yds ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ cast on 160 sts in preferred method long tail cable cast on etc increase or decrease cast on number by 12 stitch increments to change blanket width bottom border 12 row seed stitch row 1 and odd row k1 p1 to end row 2 and even row p1 k1 to end main section continue in seed stitch pattern for first 8 and last 8stitches for the 144 stitches in between execute 12 rpts of diamond and lozenge d&l pattern below 44 row in pattern i e 8 sts seed stitch pattern 12 x d&l 8 sts seed stitch pattern where d&l row1 k6 p6 row2 and all even row repeat immediately previous row pattern note seed stitch will be flipped from k1 p1 to p1 k1 on even row row3 k5 1x p1 k1 p5 r5 k4 2x p1 k 1 p4 r7 k3 3x p1 k1 p3 r9 k2 4x p1 k1 p2 r11 k1 p1 r13 p1 k1 r15 p2 4x k1 p1 k2 r17 p3 3x k1 p1 k3 r19 p4 2x k1 p1 k4 r21 p5 1x k1 p1 k5 r23 p6 k6 r25 k1 p5 k5 p1 - this section is just the first section shifted by 6 stitches r27 p1 k1 p4 k4 p1 k1 r29 k1 p1 k1 p3 k3 p1 k1 p1 r31 2x p1 k1 p2 k2 2x p1 k1 r33 k1 p1 r35 p1 k1 r37 2x k1 p1 k2 p2 2x k1 p1 r39 p1 k1 p1 k3 p3 k1 p1 k1 r41 k1 p1 k4 p4 k1 p1 r43 p1 k5 p5 k1 repeats row 1-44 four more time 5 times total repeats or to desired length top border repeat 12 row seed stitch from bottom border bind off in pattern & block pattern naturally pulls in so blanket will be long and rectangular prior to blocking ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
